ygData.subject: Final Lullaby test - it's broken alright
ygData.msgSnippet: John, Thanks for taking the time to do all the detailed testing on this song.  If Verant gives us an official response to your message, can you post it to the
ygData.messageBody:
John,

Thanks for taking the time to do all the detailed testing on this song. If
Verant gives us an official response to your message, can you post it to the
list?

Also, there was one mistake in your post. Not certain if it warrants
posting a correction to the thread. You listed Lullaby as the level 16
song. Its the level 15 song. Level 16 is the underwater breathing song. I
would hope Verant knew you were talking about the level 15 song but you
never know.

Thanks
Galtin

> Following is the text of a message I've posted to:
> http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/020098.html
> Please bump it so we can be sure Verant sees it and gets it
> fixed.
>
> Lullaby (bard L16 song) is not working as GZ stated it should
> during his Lullaby test. The relevant portions of that test
> are quoted below:
>
(snipped)
